title: Creamy Pesto Penne with Sausage
description: Quick weeknight dinner. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Brown sausage in a skillet and add to pasta.
Whisk pesto mix, milk, and olive oil; simmer until thick.
Pour sauce over pasta and sausage; toss to coat.

title: Chicken Alfredo
description: Classic creamy Alfredo tossed with tender chicken.
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Season and sauté chicken until fully cooked.
Melt butter in a pan and cook garlic.
Add cream and simmer 3–4 minutes.
Stir in parmesan until smooth.
Toss pasta with sauce and chicken.

title: Honey Garlic Chicken
description: Sweet, savory, sticky chicken perfect over rice.
instructions: Season and sear chicken in oil until browned.
Mix honey, soy sauce, and garlic.
Pour sauce over chicken and simmer until thickened.
Serve over rice.

title: Easy Beef Tacos
description: Simple, fast tacos perfect for busy nights.
instructions: Brown beef and drain.
Add taco seasoning + water and simmer.
Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

title: Chicken & Veggie Stir Fry
description: A healthy stir fry with a simple homemade sauce.
instructions: Sauté chicken until cooked.
Add vegetables and stir fry.
Mix soy sauce, honey, and cornstarch with water.
Pour sauce into skillet and cook until thickened.

title: Classic Smashburgers
description: Crispy-edged burgers made on a hot skillet.
instructions: Roll beef into 4 loose balls.
Heat skillet until very hot.
Smash beef balls into thin patties.
Season and cook until crispy, flip, add cheese.
Assemble on toasted buns with toppings.

title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Sweet BBQ sauce with chicken, red onion, and mozzarella.
instructions: Spread BBQ sauce on crust.
Top with chicken, onion, and cheese.
Bake at 425°F for 12–15 minutes.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
description: Rich garlic butter shrimp ready in under 10 minutes.
instructions: Melt butter and sauté garlic.
Add shrimp and season.
Cook until pink, then add lemon juice.

title: Hearty Beef Chili
description: Simple, flavorful chili perfect for cold nights.
instructions: Sauté onion and beef.
Add beans, tomatoes, and seasoning.
Simmer 20–30 minutes.

title: Classic French Toast
description: Golden, fluffy French toast with cinnamon.
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, and cinnamon.
Dip bread and coat both sides.
Cook in butter until golden brown.
